remarks: Property of lattice translation value.  Remark below Lemma B in [Crawley] p. 112.  TODO:  Can this be used in more places?  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2012.)  (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 25-Mar-2020.)
statement:
ltrnmw.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnmw.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
ltrnmw.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
ltrnmw.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrnmw.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnmw.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnmw $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( F ` P ) ./\ W ) = .0. ) $.
